titles.title: Tonari no Seki ni Natta Bishoujo ga Horesaseyou to Karakattekuru ga Itsunomanika Kaeriuchi ni Shiteita
The Cute Girl Sitting Next to Me Is Trying to Make Me Fall in Love With Her as a Way to Ridicule Me
but the Tables Were Turned on Her Before She Knew It
隣の席になった美少女が惚れさせようとからかってくるがいつの間にか返り討ちにしていた
Turning the Tables on the Seatmate Killer!

title: Tonari no Seki ni Natta Bishoujo ga Horesaseyou to Karakattekuru ga Itsunomanika Kaeriuchi ni Shiteita
title_english: Turning the Tables on the Seatmate Killer!
title_japanese: 隣の席になった美少女が惚れさせようとからかってくるがいつの間にか返り討ちにしていた
title_synonyms: The Cute Girl Sitting Next to Me Is Trying to Make Me Fall in Love With Her as a Way to Ridicule Me
but the Tables Were Turned on Her Before She Knew It
synopsis:
By some unsavory stroke of luck, Yuuki Narito found himself sitting next to none other than the mischievous Yui Takatsuki. This girl had built herself a reputation of stringing guys along only to reject them when they finally dared to confess their feelings for her. This, in turn, earned her a certain nickname: "The Seatmate Killer."

It was only a matter of time before Yuuki fell victim to the overly friendly Yui, but little did she know that he was as clueless as they come! The tables have suddenly been turned, and the hunter will soon become the prey.

"Damn it! You think that poker face of yours is gonna get to me?! I'll make you regret this, you'll see!"

This rom-com is off to a bumpy start as a now-determined Yui takes it upon herself to get her revenge!

(Source: Tentai Books)
background: Tonari no Seki ni Natta Bishoujo ga Horesaseyou to Karakattekuru ga Itsunomanika Kaeriuchi ni Shiteita has been published digitally in English as Turning the Tables on the Seatmate Killer! by KiraKira Media through Azuki since September 15, 2022. The volumes have also been published digitally by the same publisher since August 25, 2023.
